_header: Whoso have any quarrel or plea
_description: On a dispute over the mayoral election in Norwich in 1433 — seven irregular lines, or three long monorhyming lines

NorfRO17b.Transcription:
Who so haue eny quarell or plee in the Gildhall att Norwichbe it
                    fals or trewbut if he be withholde John Querdeling JohnHauke Nicholas
                    Waleys John BylaghJohn Mey sore schall hym rewefor they will rewle all
                    the Court with there lawis newe
